title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: I am so excited because the football season is back. Let's have some fun by dropping some random football facts that sounds crazy but true. Here are a couple of them. Balotelli's only Manchester City assist was his pass to Aguero, for the title winning goal.Kingsley Coman has won a league title in each of his 10 years as a professional footballer and done so in three different countries.Four games, four wins. Dundee United have a 100% record against Barcelona in European ties.Ronaldo is 869 days older than Messi, and Ronaldo's son is also 869 days older than Messi's first son.Gianluigi Buffon has played with Enrico Chiesa and his son Federico Chiesa.Ryan Bertrand is the only player in history to win the UCL on his debut.Gary Lineker went through his entire career without receiving a booking. Lineker was honoured with the FIFA Fair Play Award in 1990Mario Balotelli Barwuah is the only Italian player that ever won the Premier League.Mark Hughes once played for Wales and Bayern Munich in the same day in 11 November 1987.Denmark didn't qualify for the 1992 championships, yet went on to be crowned champions of Europe.Theo Walcott has more Champions League goals than many world-class players. That’s more than Ronaldo Nazario (14), Zinedine Zidane (14), Miroslav Klose (14), David Villa 14 (14), Carlos Tevez (13), Alexis Sanchez (12), Michael Owen (11) and Eden Hazard(. Zlatan Ibrahimović and Cristiano Ronaldo are the only two players in history to have scored at least one goal in every minute of a match, from the 1st to the 90th minute.Scottish Premiership club Motherwell once played Real Madrid in the final of the Copa del Rey and won.Please add yours.Source
